text: @GeraldoRivera @realDonaldTrump Trump has got his own supporters among the media (Fox News). Why aren't they reporting this? Fox TV has been campaigning for a quick reopening of the economy. Wouldn't this be a strong point in that sense? Not letting the Chinese take over the US thanks to coronavirus?
